title: C Programming
details: A C program is a text-based set of instructions written in the C programming language when compiled and executed by a computer.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Algorithms are precise step-by-step instructions for solving problems, critical in computer science and used for data manipulation and problem-solving.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: C++ is a programming language that combines object-oriented programming, making it powerful for developing software, games, and systems.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Basic data structures, like arrays and linked lists, organize and store data efficiently.It is complex algorithms and computer programs.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python is a paradigm that structures code around objects, enabling modular, reusable, and efficient software development.

title: Software Engineering
details: SE is the systematic and disciplined approach to designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software systems, ensuring they meet quality and functionaliy.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: AWS (Amazon Web Services) is a top cloud computing platform offering various services. Cloud computing delivers on-demand resources.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) known for its speed and reliability, widely used for storing and managing structured data.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
